RULE_NW001.rule: Minimum spacing of NW (or) PW at different potential is 180nm

RULE_NW002.rule: Minimum spacing of NW (or) PW at same potential is 110nm

RULE_NW004A.rule: Minimum area of NW is 0.140 um2

RULE_NW004B.rule: Minimum enclosed area of NW is 0.140 um2

RULE_NW006A.rule: Minimum extension of NW past CHANNEL_A is 80nm
RULE_NW006A.script:
CHANNEL_A_VERTICAL_EDGES = CHANNEL_A ANGLE == 90 
NW_VERTICAL_EDGES = NW ANGLE == 90 
INTERNAL NW_VERTICAL_EDGES CHANNEL_A_VERTICAL_EDGES < 0.080

RULE_NW006B.rule: Minimum extension of NW past CHANNEL_B is 80nm
RULE_NW006B.script:
CHANNEL_B_VERTICAL_EDGES = CHANNEL_B ANGLE == 90 
NW_VERTICAL_EDGES = NW ANGLE == 90 
INTERNAL NW_VERTICAL_EDGES CHANNEL_B_VERTICAL_EDGES < 0.080

RULE_NW006AB.rule: Minimum extension of NW past CHANNEL_AB is 80nm
RULE_NW006AB.script:
CHANNEL_AB_VERTICAL_EDGES = CHANNEL_AB ANGLE == 90 
NW_VERTICAL_EDGES = NW ANGLE == 90 
INTERNAL NW_VERTICAL_EDGES CHANNEL_AB_VERTICAL_EDGES < 0.080

RULE_ACT001.rule: Minimum vertical width of ACT layer is 48nm

RULE_ACT002.rule: Minimum Incremental vertical width of ACT layer is 40nm
RULE_ACT002.script:
ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = ACT ANGLE == 0 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES < 0.048 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.048 < 0.088 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.088 < 0.128 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.128 < 0.168 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.168 < 0.208 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.208 < 0.248 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.248 < 0.288 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.288 < 0.328 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.328 < 0.368 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.368 < 0.408 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.408 < 0.448 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.448 < 0.488 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.488 < 0.528 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.528 < 0.568 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.568 < 0.608 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.608 < 0.648 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.648 < 0.688 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.688 < 0.728 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.728 < 0.768 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.768 < 0.808 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.808 < 0.848 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.848 < 0.888 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.888 < 0.928 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.928 < 0.968 
INTERNAL ACT_HORIZONTAL_EDGES > 0.968 < 1.008

RULE_ACT003.rule: Minimum vertical spacing of ACT is 62nm

RULE_ACT004.rule: Minimum horizontal width of ACT is 96nm

RULE_ACT005.rule: Horizontal spacing of ACT  must be 32nm, 96nm or >= 160nm
RULE_ACT005.script:
ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES = ACT ANGLE == 90 
EXTERNAL ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0 < 0.032 OPPOSITE 
EXTERNAL ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.032 < 0.096 OPPOSITE 
EXTERNAL ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.096 < 0.16 OPPOSITE

RULE_ACT007A.rule: Minimum spacing of NW to ACT is 31nm

RULE_ACT007B.rule: Minimum enclosure of NW to ACT is 31nm

RULE_ACT008A.rule: Minimum area of ACT is 0.004608 um2

RULE_ACT008B.rule: Minimum enclosed area of ACT is 0.004608 um2

RULE_ACT009.rule: Maximum distance between ACT forming a MOS device and ACT forming a bulk/substrate contact within the same well/substrate is 30um, to prevent latch up
RULE_ACT009.script:
ACT_MOS_DEV_A = GATEA AND ACT 
ACT_MOS_DEV_B = GATEB AND ACT 
 
ACT_CONTACT = AIL1 AND ACT 
NTAP = NW AND NIM 
AIL1_NTAP = ACT_CONTACT AND NTAP 
AIL1_PTAP = ACT_CONTACT AND PIM 
a = AIL1_NTAP SIZE BY 30 
ACT_MOS_DEV_A NOT INSIDE a 
ACT_MOS_DEV_B NOT INSIDE a 
b = AIL1_PTAP SIZE BY 30 
ACT_MOS_DEV_A NOT INSIDE b 
ACT_MOS_DEV_B NOT INSIDE b

RULE_GATE001A.rule: Exact horizontal width of GATE [A] is 20, 16 or 14 nm
RULE_GATE001A.script:
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges < 0.014 
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges > 0.014 < 0.016 
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges > 0.016 < 0.020 
INTERNAL GATEA_vertical_edges > 0.020 < 0.200

RULE_GATE001B.rule: Exact horizontal width of GATE [B] is 20, 16 or 14 nm
RULE_GATE001B.script:
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges < 0.014 
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges > 0.014 < 0.016 
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges > 0.016 < 0.020 
INTERNAL GATEB_vertical_edges > 0.020 < 0.200

RULE_GATE002A.rule: Min horizontal pitch of GATE [A] is 128 nm
RULE_GATE002A.script:
x = INT GATEA_vertical_edges < 1 
y = DFM COPY x CENTERLINE 
y_copy = EXPAND EDGE y INSIDE BY 0.0001 
y_copy_vertical_edge =  y_copy ANGLE ==90 
EXT y_copy_vertical_edge < 0.127 OPPOSITE

RULE_GATE002B.rule: Min horizontal pitch of GATE [B] is 128 nm
RULE_GATE002B.script:
x = INT GATEB_vertical_edges < 1 
y = DFM COPY x CENTERLINE 
y_copy = EXPAND EDGE y INSIDE BY 0.0001 
y_copy_vertical_edge =  y_copy ANGLE ==90 
EXT y_copy_vertical_edge < 0.127 OPPOSITE

RULE_GATE003.rule: Minimum horizontal spacing of GATE[A] and GATE[B] is 44 nm

RULE_GATE005A.rule: Minimum extension of ACT past GATE [A] is 38nm

RULE_GATE005B.rule: Minimum extension of ACT past GATE [B] is 38nm

RULE_GATE006A.rule: Minimum extension of GATE [A] past ACT is 62nm

RULE_GATE006B.rule: Minimum extension of GATE [B] past ACT is 62nm

RULE_GATE007A.rule: Minimum length of Gate A (vertical edge, gate C ignored) 200nm

RULE_GATE007B.rule: Minimum length of Gate B (vertical edge, gate C ignored) 200nm

RULE_GATE008A.rule: (gatea not gatec) maximum distance to neighbor shape on same design mask is 236nm
RULE_GATE008A.script:
GateAnotC = GATEA NOT GATEC 
x = SIZE GateAnotC BY 0.237 
GATEA NOT x

RULE_GATE008B.rule: (gateb not gatec) maximum distance to neighbor shape 236nm
RULE_GATE008B.script:
GateBnotC = GATEB NOT GATEC 
x = SIZE GateBnotC BY 0.237 
GATEB NOT x

RULE_GATE001AB.rule: Exact horizontal width of GATE [AB] is 20, 16 or 14 nm
RULE_GATE001AB.script:
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES < 0.014 
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.014 < 0.016 
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.016 < 0.020 
INTERNAL GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.020 < 0.800

RULE_GATE002AB.rule: Min horizontal pitch of GATE [AB] is 64nm
RULE_GATE002AB.script:
x = INT GATEAB_VERTICAL_EDGES < 1 
y = DFM COPY x CENTERLINE 
y_copy = EXPAND EDGE y INSIDE BY 0.0001 
EXT y_copy < 0.063 OPPOSITE

RULE_GATE003AB.rule: Minimum horizontal spacing of GATE[AB] is 44 nm

RULE_GATE005AB.rule: Minimum extension of ACT past GATE [AB] is 38nm

RULE_GATE006AB.rule: Minimum extension of GATE [AB] past ACT is 62nm

RULE_GATE007AB.rule: Minimum length of Gate AB (vertical edge, gate C ignored) 200nm

RULE_GATE008AB.rule: (gateAB not gatec) maximum distance to neighbor shape 236nm
RULE_GATE008AB.script:
GateABnotC = GATEAB NOT GATEC 
x = SIZE GateABnotC BY 0.237 
GATEAB NOT x

RULE_GATE001Ca.rule: Exact vertical width of GATEC is 32nm (1 is arbitrary large value) shape is oriented horizonally
RULE_GATE001Ca.script:
vert_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 90 
hor_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 0 
vert_edges_int = INT vert_edges < 1 
hor_edges_int = INT hor_edges < 1 
vert_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check1 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] < 0 
hor_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check2 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] > 0 
hor_edges_hor_pol = hor_polygons angle == 0 
INT hor_edges_hor_pol > 0 < 0.032 
INT hor_edges_hor_pol > 0.032 < 1

RULE_GATE002Ca.rule: Minimum horizontal length of GATEC is 128nm shape is oriented horizonatally
RULE_GATE002Ca.script:
vert_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 90 
hor_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 0 
vert_edges_int = INT vert_edges < 1 
hor_edges_int = INT hor_edges < 1 
vert_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check1 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] < 0 
hor_polygons = DFM PROPERTY GATEC hor_edges_int vert_edges_int OVERLAP MULTI [check2 = EW(vert_edges_int) - EW(hor_edges_int)] > 0 
vert_edges_hor_pol = hor_polygons angle == 90 
INT vert_edges_hor_pol < 0.128

RULE_GATE004Ca.rule: Minimum extension of GATEC past GATEA (horizontal direction) is 22nm
RULE_GATE004Ca.script:
gatec_vert_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 90 
gatea_vert_edges = GATEA ANGLE == 90 
ENC gatea_vert_edges gatec_vert_edges  < 0.022

RULE_GATE004Cb.rule: Minimum extension of GATEC past GATEB (horizontal direction) is 22nm
RULE_GATE004Cb.script:
gatec_vert_edges = GATEC ANGLE == 90 
gateb_vert_edges = GATEB ANGLE == 90 
ENC gateb_vert_edges gatec_vert_edges < 0.022

RULE_GATE005C.rule: GATEC minimum space to ACT is 15nm

RULE_GATE007C.rule: GATEC shape bottom or top must be aligned if distance < 192nm
RULE_GATE007C.script:
ext_region = EXT GATEC < 0.192 REGION 
angled_edges = ANGLE ext_region >0 <90 
angled_regions = ext_region WITH EDGE angled_edges 
GATEC INTERACT angled_regions

RULE_VT001.rule: Minimum width of VTL/VTH/(not (VTL or VTH)) is 144nm
RULE_VT001.script:
DERIVED_LAYER_1 = VTH NOT (VTL OR VTH) 
DERIVED_LAYER_2 = VTL NOT (VTL OR VTH) 
INTERNAL DERIVED_LAYER_1 < 0.144 
INTERNAL DERIVED_LAYER_2 < 0.144

RULE_VT002.rule: Minimum spacing of VTL/VTH/(not (VTL or VTH)) is 144nm
RULE_VT002.script:
DERIVED_LAYER_1 = VTH NOT (VTL OR VTH) 
DERIVED_LAYER_2 = VTL NOT (VTL OR VTH) 
EXTERNAL DERIVED_LAYER_1 < 0.144 
EXTERNAL DERIVED_LAYER_2 < 0.144

RULE_VTL003A.rule: Minimum enclosure of GATEA by VTL is 64nm

RULE_VTL003B.rule: Minimum enclosure of GATEB by VTL is 64nm

RULE_VTH003A.rule: Minimum enclosure of GATEA by VTH is 64nm

RULE_VTH003B.rule: Minimum enclosure of GATEB by VTH is 64nm

RULE_VTL004A.rule: Minimum spacing of GATEA to VTL is 44nm

RULE_VTL004B.rule: Minimum spacing of GATEB to VTL is 44nm

RULE_VTH004A.rule: Minimum spacing of GATEA to VTH is 44nm

RULE_VTH004B.rule: Minimum spacing of GATEB to VTH is 44nm

RULE_NIM002A.rule: Minimum spacing of NIM to channel: width of SD at GATE[A] is 32nm

RULE_NIM002B.rule: Minimum spacing of NIM to channel: width of SD at GATE[B] is 32nm

RULE_NIM002AB.rule: Minimum spacing of NIM to channel: width of SD at GATE[AB] is 32nm

RULE_PIM002A.rule: Minimum spacing of PIM to channel: width of SD at GATE[A] is 32nm

RULE_PIM002B.rule: Minimum spacing of PIM to channel: width of SD at GATE[B] is 32nm

RULE_PIM002AB.rule: Minimum spacing of PIM to channel: width of SD at GATE[AB] is 32nm

RULE_NIM003A.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Horizontal Direction): Overlap between Gate[A] and NIM  is 32nm

RULE_NIM003B.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Horizontal Direction): Overlap between Gate[B] and NIM  is 32nm

RULE_PIM003A.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Horizontal Direction): Overlap between Gate[A] and NIM  is 32nm

RULE_PIM003B.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Horizontal Direction): Overlap between Gate[B] and NIM  is 32nm

RULE_NIM004A.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Vertical Direction): Overlap between Gate[A] and NIM  is 30nm

RULE_NIM004B.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Vertical Direction): Overlap between Gate[B] and NIM  is 30nm

RULE_PIM004A.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Vertical Direction): Overlap between Gate[A] and NIM  is 30nm

RULE_PIM004B.rule: Minimum Extension of NIM past channel (Vertical Direction): Overlap between Gate[B] and NIM  is 30nm

RULE_NIM005.rule: Minimum spacing of NIM to (ACT enclosed by PIM) is 0.030 um
RULE_NIM005.script:
ACT_ENCLOSED_PIM = ACT INSIDE PIM 
EXTERNAL NIM ACT_ENCLOSED_PIM < 0.03

RULE_PIM005.rule: Minimum spacing of PIM to (ACT enclosed by NIM) is 0.030 um
RULE_PIM005.script:
ACT_ENCLOSED_NIM = ACT INSIDE NIM 
EXTERNAL PIM ACT_ENCLOSED_NIM < 0.03

RULE_NIM006.rule: Minimum enclosure of ACT by NIM is 0.030 um

RULE_PIM006.rule: Minimum enclosure of ACT by PIM is 0.030 um

RULE_NIM007A.rule: Minimum area of NIM is 0.049 um2

RULE_NIM007B.rule: Minimum enclosed area of NIM is 0.049 um2

RULE_PIM007A.rule: Minimum area of PIM is 0.049 um2

RULE_PIM007B.rule: Minimum enclosed area of PIM is 0.049 um2

RULE_AIL1003A.rule: Minimum spacing of AIL1 to GATE[A] is 8nm

RULE_AIL1003B.rule: Minimum spacing of AIL1 to GATE[B] is 8nm

RULE_AIL1004.rule: Minimum extenxion of ACT past AIL1 in horizontal direction is 2nm
RULE_AIL1004.script:
AIL1_VERTICAL_EDGES = AIL1 ANGLE == 90 
ENC AIL1_VERTICAL_EDGES ACT < 0.002

RULE_AIL1005.rule: Minimum Vertical length of AIL1 is 58nm

RULE_AIL1006.rule: Minimum Vertical spacing of AIL1 is 62nm

RULE_AIL1007.rule: Minimum Vertical extension of AIL1 past ACT is 0nm
RULE_AIL1007.script:
AIL1_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = AIL1 ANGLE==0 
INSIDE EDGE AIL1_HORIZONTAL_EDGES ACT

RULE_AIL2003A.rule: Minimum spacing between AIL2 and GATE[A] is 2nm

RULE_AIL2003B.rule: Minimum spacing between AIL2 and GATE[B] is 2nm

RULE_AIL2004.rule: Minimum horizontal enclosure of AIL1 around AIL2 is 2 nm
RULE_AIL2004.script:
AIL1_VERTICAL_EDGES = AIL1 ANGLE == 90 
ENC AIL1_VERTICAL_EDGES AIL2 < 0.002

RULE_AIL2005.rule: Minimum Vertical overlap of AIL1 and AIL2 is 6nm

RULE_AIL2007.script:
AIL2_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = AIL2 ANGLE == 0 
EXTERNAL AIL2_HORIZONTAL_EDGES < 0.062 OPPOSITE

RULE_AIL2009.rule: Minimum horizontal spacing of AIL1 and AIL2 is 16nm
RULE_AIL2009.script:
AIL1_VERTICAL_EDGES = AIL1 ANGLE == 90 
AIL2_VERTICAL_EDGES = AIL2 ANGLE == 90 
EXTERNAL AIL1_VERTICAL_EDGES AIL2_VERTICAL_EDGES < 0.016 NOT CONNECTED

RULE_AIL2010.rule: Minimum vertical spacing of AIL1 and AIL2 is 16nm
RULE_AIL2010.script:
AIL1_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = AIL1 ANGLE == 0 
AIL2_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = AIL2 ANGLE == 0 
EXTERNAL AIL1_HORIZONTAL_EDGES AIL2_HORIZONTAL_EDGES < 0.016 NOT CONNECTED

RULE_GIL001.rule: Minimum vertical width of GIL is 44nm

RULE_GIL002.rule: Minimum horizontal length of GIL is 56nm

RULE_GIL003.rule: Minimum vertical spacing of GIL is 32nm

RULE_GIL004.rule: Minimum horizontal spacing of GIL is 40nm

RULE_GIL005.rule: Minimum vertical spacing of GIL to ACT is 6nm
RULE_GIL005.script:
ALL_HORIZ_EDGES = ANGLE GIL == 0 
EXTERNAL ALL_HORIZ_EDGES ACT < 0.006

RULE_GIL006A.rule: Minimum horizontal extension of GIL past GATE[A] is 2nm
RULE_GIL006A.script:
GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES = GIL ANGLE == 90 
ENC GATEA GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES < 0.002

RULE_GIL006B.rule: Minimum horizontal extension of GIL past GATE[B] is 2nm
RULE_GIL006B.script:
GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES = GIL ANGLE == 90 
ENC GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES GATEB < 0.002

RULE_GIL007.rule: Minimum horizontal space of GIL to AIL2 is 8nm
RULE_GIL007.script:
GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES = GIL ANGLE == 90 
EXT GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES AIL2 < 0.008 NOT CONNECTED

RULE_GIL008.rule: Minimum vertical space of GIL to AIL2 is 5nm
RULE_GIL008.script:
GIL_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = GIL ANGLE == 0 
EXT GIL_HORIZONTAL_EDGES AIL2 < 0.005

RULE_GIL009A.rule: Minimum horizontal space of GIL to GATE[A] is 10nm
RULE_GIL009A.script:
GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES = GIL ANGLE == 90 
EXT GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES GATEA < 0.010

RULE_GIL009B.rule: Minimum horizontal space of GIL to GATE[B] is 10nm
RULE_GIL009B.script:
GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES = GIL ANGLE == 90 
EXT GIL_VERTICAL_EDGES GATEB < 0.010

RULE_GIL010.rule: Minimum horizontal overlap of GIL and AIL2 is 2nm
RULE_GIL010.script:
AIL2_VERTICAL_EDGES = AIL2 ANGLE == 90 
ENC AIL2_VERTICAL_EDGES GIL < 0.002 CONNECTED

RULE_GIL011.rule: Minimum vertical extension of AIL2 past GIL is 4nm
RULE_GIL011.script:
AIL2_HORIZONTAL_EDGES = AIL2 ANGLE == 0 
ENC GIL AIL2_HORIZONTAL_EDGES < 0.004

RULE_V0001a.rule: V0 is a square with 28nm edge length

RULE_V0001bA.rule: V0 is a rectangle 28nm x 56nm when enclosed in M1A with width >= 60nm
RULE_V0001bA.script:
wide_M1A = M1A WITH WIDTH >= 0.060 
v0_wide_M1A = v0 INSIDE wide_M1A 
RECTANGLE v0_wide_M1A != 0.056 BY != 0.028

RULE_V0001bB.rule: V0 is a rectangle 28nm x 56nm when enclosed in M1B with width >= 60nm
RULE_V0001bB.script:
wide_M1B = M1B WITH WIDTH >= 0.060 
v0_wide_M1B = v0 INSIDE wide_M1B 
RECTANGLE v0_wide_M1B != 0.056 BY != 0.028

RULE_V0002GA.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength exactly = 28nm is 36nm, assuming runlength is the common length between GIL and M1, and GIL is vertical
RULE_V0002GA.script:
GIL_M1A = GIL AND M1A 
GIL_M1A_EDGES = ANGLE GIL_M1A == 90 
GIL_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH GIL_M1A_EDGES == 0.028 
GIL_M1A_polygons = GIL WITH EDGE GIL_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_GIL_M1A = V0 INTERACT GIL_M1A_polygons 
EXT V0_GIL_M1A < 0.036

RULE_V0002AA.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength exactly = 28nm is 36nm, assuming runlength is the common length between AIL2 and M1, and AIL2 is vertical
RULE_V0002AA.script:
AIL2_M1A = AIL2 AND M1A 
AIL2_M1A_EDGES = ANGLE AIL2_M1A == 90 
AIL2_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH AIL2_M1A_EDGES == 0.028 
AIL2_M1A_polygons = AIL2 WITH EDGE AIL2_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_AIL2_M1A = V0 INTERACT AIL2_M1A_polygons 
EXT V0_AIL2_M1A < 0.036

RULE_V0002GB.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength exactly = 28nm is 36nm, assuming runlength is the common length between GIL and M1, and GIL is vertical
RULE_V0002GB.script:
GIL_M1B = GIL AND M1B 
GIL_M1B_EDGES = ANGLE GIL_M1B == 90 
GIL_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH GIL_M1B_EDGES == 0.028 
GIL_M1B_polygons = GIL WITH EDGE GIL_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_GIL_M1B = V0 INTERACT GIL_M1B_polygons 
EXT V0_GIL_M1B < 0.036

RULE_V0002AB.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength exactly = 28nm is 36nm, assuming runlength is the common length between AIL2 and M1, and AIL2 is vertical
RULE_V0002AB.script:
AIL2_M1B = AIL2 AND M1B 
AIL2_M1B_EDGES = ANGLE AIL2_M1B == 90 
AIL2_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH AIL2_M1B_EDGES == 0.028 
AIL2_M1B_polygons = AIL2 WITH EDGE AIL2_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_AIL2_M1B = V0 INTERACT AIL2_M1B_polygons 
EXT V0_AIL2_M1B < 0.036

RULE_V0003GA.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength < 28nm is 50nm, assuming runlength is the common length between GIL and M1, and GIL is vertical
RULE_V0003GA.script:
GIL_M1A = GIL AND M1A 
GIL_M1A_EDGES = ANGLE GIL_M1A == 90 
GIL_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH GIL_M1A_EDGES < 0.028 
GIL_M1A_polygons = GIL WITH EDGE GIL_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_GIL_M1A = V0 INTERACT GIL_M1A_polygons 
EXT V0_GIL_M1A < 0.050

RULE_V0003AA.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength < 28nm is 50nm, assuming runlength is the common length between AIL2 and M1, and AIL2 is vertical
RULE_V0003AA.script:
AIL2_M1A = AIL2 AND M1A 
AIL2_M1A_EDGES = ANGLE AIL2_M1A == 90 
AIL2_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH AIL2_M1A_EDGES < 0.028 
AIL2_M1A_polygons = AIL2 WITH EDGE AIL2_M1A_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_AIL2_M1A = V0 INTERACT AIL2_M1A_polygons 
EXT V0_AIL2_M1A < 0.050

RULE_V0003GB.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength < 28nm is 50nm, assuming runlength is the common length between GIL and M1, and GIL is vertical
RULE_V0003GB.script:
GIL_M1B = GIL AND M1B 
GIL_M1B_EDGES = ANGLE GIL_M1B == 90 
GIL_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH GIL_M1B_EDGES < 0.028 
GIL_M1B_polygons = GIL WITH EDGE GIL_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_GIL_M1B = V0 INTERACT GIL_M1B_polygons 
EXT V0_GIL_M1B < 0.050

RULE_V0003AB.rule: Minimum spacing of V0 if runlength < 28nm is 50nm, assuming runlength is the common length between AIL2 and M1, and AIL2 is vertical
RULE_V0003AB.script:
AIL2_M1B = AIL2 AND M1B 
AIL2_M1B_EDGES = ANGLE AIL2_M1B == 90 
AIL2_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH AIL2_M1B_EDGES < 0.028 
AIL2_M1B_polygons = AIL2 WITH EDGE AIL2_M1B_EDGES_LENGTH 
V0_AIL2_M1B = V0 INTERACT AIL2_M1B_polygons 
EXT V0_AIL2_M1B < 0.050

RULE_V0004.rule: V0 must be inside [AIL2|GIL] and M1[A|B]
RULE_V0004.script:
layer_intersections = OR (AIL2 AND M1A) (AIL2 AND M1B) (GIL AND M1A) (GIL AND M1B) (AIL2 AND M1) (GIL AND M1) 
V0 OUTSIDE layer_intersections

RULE_V0005a.rule: V0 enclosure by AIL2 in 2 opposite sides, horizontal direction 2nm
RULE_V0005a.script:
v0_vertical_edges = v0 ANGLE ==90 
AIL2_vertical_edges = AIL2 ANGLE ==90 
ENC v0_vertical_edges AIL2_vertical_edges < 0.002

RULE_M1023A.rule: Allowed enclosures of V0 by M1A are [0.028,0.002], [0.032,0], or [0.01,0.01] on opposite sides
RULE_M1023A.script:
RECTANGLE ENCLOSURE V0 M1A ABUT>0<90 SINGULAR ORTHOGONAL ONLY 
GOOD 0.028 0.002 0.028 0.002 
GOOD 0.032 0 0.032 0 
GOOD 0.010 0.010 0.010 0.010

RULE_M1023B.rule: Allowed enclosures of V0 by M1B are [0.028,0.002], [0.032,0], or [0.01,0.01] on opposite sides
RULE_M1023B.script:

GOOD 0.028 0.002 0.028 0.002 
GOOD 0.032 0 0.032 0 
GOOD 0.010 0.010 0.010 0.010

RULE_M1023.rule: Allowed enclosures of V0 by M1 are [0.028,0.002], [0.032,0], or [0.01,0.01] on opposite sides

GOOD 0.032 0 0.032 0 
GOOD 0.010 0.010 0.010 0.010

RULE_M1024.rule: Allowed enclosures of V0 by M1A-M1B stitches are [0.032,0.002], [0.04,0], or [0.014,0.014] on opposite sides
RULE_M1024.script:
M1AB_stitch = M1A AND M1B 
RECTANGLE ENCLOSURE V0 M1AB_stitch ABUT>0<90 SINGULAR ORTHOGONAL ONLY 
GOOD 0.032 0.002 0.032 0.002 
GOOD 0.040 0 0.040 0 
GOOD 0.014 0.014 0.014 0.014

RULE_M1025A.rule: V0 center must be aligned to wire center (between 2 longest edges)
RULE_M1025A.script:
V0_M1A_OVERLAP = V0 AND M1A 
M1A_edges = INT M1A < 1 
V0_edges = INT V0 < 1 
M1A_centerline = DFM COPY M1A_edges CENTERLINE 
V0_centerline = DFM COPY V0_edges CENTERLINE 
coin_centerlines = M1A_centerline COIN EDGE V0_centerline 
x = EXPAND EDGE coin_centerlines INSIDE BY 0.01 
y = copy x 
V0_M1A_OVERLAP NOT INTERACT y

RULE_M1026A.rule: V0 shape must be rectangular if enclosing M1A wire width >= 60nm
RULE_M1026A.script:
wide_M1A = M1A WITH WIDTH >= 0.060 
V0_in_wideM1A = V0 INSIDE wide_M1A 
NOT RECTANGLE V0_in_wideM1A

RULE_M1026B.rule: V0 shape must be rectangular if enclosing M1B wire width >= 60nm
RULE_M1026B.script:
wide_M1B = M1B WITH WIDTH >= 0.060

NOT RECTANGLE V0_in_wideM1B

RULE_M1027B.rule: M1B minimum area for rectangular shape is 0.0024um2

RULE_M1027.rule: M1 minimum area for rectangular shape is 0.0024um2

RULE_M1028B.script:

RULE_V1001a.rule: V1 is a square with 28nm edge length

RULE_V1001b.rule: V1 is a rectangle 28nm x 56nm when enclosed in M1A with width >= 60nm
RULE_V1001b.script:
wide_M1A = M1A WITH WIDTH >= 0.060 
V1_wide_M1A = V1 INSIDE wide_M1A

RULE_V1002A.rule: Minimum spacing of V1 if runlength exactly = 28nm is 36nm, assuming runlength is the common length between M1 and MINT1, and M1 is vertical
RULE_V1002A.script:
M1A_MINT1A = M1A AND MINT1A 
M1A_MINT1A_EDGES = ANGLE M1A_MINT1A == 90 
M1A_MINT1A_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH M1A_MINT1A_EDGES == 0.028 
M1A_MINT1A_polygons = M1A WITH EDGE M1A_MINT1A_EDGES_LENGTH 
V1_M1A_MINT1A = V1 INTERACT M1A_MINT1A_polygons 
EXT V1_M1A_MINT1A < 0.036

RULE_V1002B.rule: Minimum spacing of V1 if runlength exactly = 28nm is 36nm, assuming runlength is the common length between M1 and MINT1, and M1 is vertical
RULE_V1002B.script:
M1B_MINT1B = M1B AND MINT1B 
M1B_MINT1B_EDGES = ANGLE M1B_MINT1B == 90 
M1B_MINT1B_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH M1B_MINT1B_EDGES == 0.028 
M1B_MINT1B_polygons = M1B WITH EDGE M1B_MINT1B_EDGES_LENGTH 
V1_M1B_MINT1B = V1 INTERACT M1B_MINT1B_polygons 
EXT V1_M1B_MINT1B < 0.036

RULE_V1003A.rule: Minimum spacing of V1 if runlength < 28nm is 50nm, assuming runlength is the common length between M1 and MINT1, and M1 is vertical
RULE_V1003A.script:
M1A_MINT1A = M1A AND MINT1A 
M1A_MINT1A_EDGES = ANGLE M1A_MINT1A == 90 
M1A_MINT1A_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH M1A_MINT1A_EDGES < 0.028 
M1A_MINT1A_polygons = M1A WITH EDGE M1A_MINT1A_EDGES_LENGTH 
V1_M1A_MINT1A = V1 INTERACT M1A_MINT1A_polygons 
EXT V1_M1A_MINT1A < 0.050

RULE_V1003B.script:
M1B_MINT1B = M1B AND MINT1B 
M1B_MINT1B_EDGES = ANGLE M1B_MINT1B == 90

M1B_MINT1B_polygons = M1B WITH EDGE M1B_MINT1B_EDGES_LENGTH 
V1_M1B_MINT1B = V1 INTERACT M1B_MINT1B_polygons 
EXT V1_M1B_MINT1B < 0.050

RULE_V1004.rule: V1 must be inside (M1A and MINT1A) or (M1B and MINT1B) or (M1A and MINT1B) or (M1B and MINT1A) or (M1 and MINT1)
RULE_V1004.script:
layer_intersections = OR (M1A AND MINT1A) (M1B AND MINT1B) (M1A AND MINT1B) (M1B AND MINT1A) (M1 AND MINT1) 
V1 OUTSIDE layer_intersections

MINT5B_MSMG1_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH MINT5B_MSMG1_EDGES < 0.028 
MINT5B_MSMG1_polygons = MINT5B WITH EDGE MINT5B_MSMG1_EDGES_LENGTH

RULE_MINT2023A.rule: Allowed enclosures of VINT1 by MINT2A are [0.028,0.002], [0.032,0], or [0.01,0.01] on opposite sides
RULE_MINT2023A.script:
RECTANGLE ENCLOSURE VINT1 MINT2A ABUT>0<90 SINGULAR ORTHOGONAL ONLY 
GOOD 0.028 0.002 0.028 0.002 
GOOD 0.032 0 0.032 0 
GOOD 0.010 0.010 0.010 0.010

RULE_MINT3002A.rule: One of two edges connected to the same vertex must have at least one of 56nm
RULE_MINT3002A.script:

INT x < 0.001 ABUT

RULE_MINT5023A.rule: Allowed enclosures of VINT4 by MINT5A are [0.028,0.002], [0.032,0], or [0.01,0.01] on opposite sides

RULE_VSMG1001b.script:

RULE_VSMG1002.rule: Minimum spacing of VSMG1 if runlength exactly = 56nm is 72nm
RULE_VSMG1002.script:
MSMG1_MSMG2 = MSMG1 AND MSMG2 
MSMG1_MSMG2_EDGES = ANGLE MSMG1_MSMG2 == 90 
MSMG1_MSMG2_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH MSMG1_MSMG2_EDGES == 0.056 
MSMG1_MSMG2_polygons = MSMG1 WITH EDGE MSMG1_MSMG2_EDGES_LENGTH 
VSMG1_MSMG1_MSMG2 = VSMG1 INTERACT MSMG1_MSMG2_polygons 
EXT VSMG1_MSMG1_MSMG2 < 0.072

EXT VSMG1_MSMG1_MSMG2 < 0.100

EXT VG1_MG1_MG2 < 0.144

RULE_VG1003.rule: Minimum spacing of VG1 if runlength < 112nm is 200nm
RULE_VG1003.script:
MG1_MG2 = MG1 AND MG2 
MG1_MG2_EDGES = ANGLE MG1_MG2 == 90 
MG1_MG2_EDGES_LENGTH = PATH LENGTH MG1_MG2_EDGES < 0.112 
MG1_MG2_polygons = MG1 WITH EDGE MG1_MG2_EDGES_LENGTH 
VG1_MG1_MG2 = VG1 INTERACT MG1_MG2_polygons 
EXT VG1_MG1_MG2 < 0.200

RULE_VG1004.rule: VG1 must be inside (MG1 and MG2)
RULE_VG1004.script:
layer_intersections = MG1 AND MG2 
VG1 OUTSIDE layer_intersections

RULE_VG1005.rule: VG1 shape must be rectangular if enclosing MG1 wire width >= 240nm
RULE_VG1005.script:
wide_MG1 = MG1 WITH WIDTH >= 0.240 
VG1_in_wideMG1 = VG1 INSIDE wide_MG1 
NOT RECTANGLE VG1_in_wideMG1

RULE_MG1002.rule: One of two edges connected to the same vertex must have at least one of 224nm
RULE_MG1002.script:
x = CONVEX EDGE MG1 ANGLE1==90 ANGLE2==90 WITH LENGTH < 0.224 
INT x < 0.001 ABUT

RULE_MG1003.rule: maximum length of MG1 for wires with min width 112nm is 3.84um
RULE_MG1003.script:
wide_MG1 = MG1 with width <= 0.112 
d = INT wide_MG1 <= 1 opposite 
d_p = dfm property wide_MG1 d overlap abut also [EC1 = EC(d)] > 3.840 
copy d_p

RULE_MG1004.rule: MG1 end-of-line spacing (end-of-line edge defined as edge < 128nm) is 272nm

RULE_MG1006.rule: Minimum spacing of MG1 when MG1 is wider than 120nm and longer than 1200nm is 120nm
RULE_MG1006.script:
MG1_wide = MG1 WITH WIDTH > 0.120 
d = INT MG1_wide <= 1 OPPOSITE 
d_p = DFM PROPERTY MG1_wide d OVERLAP ABUT ALSO [EC1 = EC(d)] > 1.200 
EXT d_p MG1 <= 0.120

RULE_MG1007.rule: Minimum spacing of MG1 when MG1 is wider than 240nm and longer than 1800nm is 240nm
RULE_MG1007.script:

d = INT MG1_wide <= 1 OPPOSITE 
d_p = DFM PROPERTY MG1_wide d OVERLAP ABUT ALSO [EC1 = EC(d)] > 1.800 
EXT d_p MG1 <= 0.240

RULE_MG1008.rule: Minimum spacing of MG1 when MG1 is wider than 320nm and longer than 2400nm is 320nm

d = INT MG1_wide <= 1 OPPOSITE

EXT d_p MG1 <= 0.320

RULE_MG1009.rule: Minimum spacing of MG1 when MG1 is wider than 600nm and longer than 2400nm is 600nm

RULE_MG1010.script:
RECTANGLE ENCLOSURE VSMG5 MG1 ABUT>0<90 SINGULAR ORTHOGONAL ONLY 
GOOD 0.0 0.0 0.0 0.0

RULE_MG1012.rule: VSMG5 shape must be rectangular if enclosing MG1 wire width >= 240nm

RULE_MG1013.rule: MG1 minimum area for rectangular shape is 0.0024um2

RULE_MG1014.rule: MG1 min area for non-rectangular shape is 0.0036um2
RULE_MG1014.script:
no_rect_MG1 = NOT RECTANGLE MG1 
AREA no_rect_MG1 < 0.0036

RULE_MG2002.rule: One of two edges connected to the same vertex must have at least one of 224nm
RULE_MG2002.script:

RULE_MG2010.script:

RULE_MIS01.rule: Shapes on all layers must be on a 0.5 nm grid

RULE_MIS02A.rule: [ANTENNA] Ratio of Maximum Allowed GATE[A] Area to transistor Gate Area is 100:1
RULE_MIS02A.script: NET AREA RATIO GATEA GIL M1A MINT1A MINT2A MINT3A MINT4A MINT5A OVER N_GATE_A P_GATE_A > 100

RULE_MIS02B.rule: [ANTENNA] Ratio of Maximum Allowed GATE[B] Area to transistor Gate Area is 100:1
